select.if: select file_id as "fileId", data_list_id as "dataListId", file_name as "fileName", name as "dataListName", f.visual_id as "visualId", f.visual_type as "visualType" from analytic_parameter a, files f, data_list d where a.type = #{type} and f.id::text = a.file_id and d.id::text = a.data_list_id

mapper.select: select address from analytic_parameter where benchmark_id = #{benchmarkId} and refer_id = #{referId}
